nodes.text: Gunship Blueprint was the name of a blueprint available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It depicted the design specifications for a Low Altitude Assault Transport, a type of gunship commonly used during the Clone Wars.
Gunship Blueprint was a painting in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
